articles.author: Ben Morse, CNN
articles.title: Scottie Scheffler wins 2022 Masters, the first major of his career, following dominant performance - CNN
articles.description: Scottie Scheffler won the 2022 Masters on Sunday following a dominant performance at Augusta National.

articles.title: 27 states report rise in COVID infections in past 8 days - CBS Evening News
articles.description: In California, COVID cases are up 78% in the last four days, but there has been no increase in the critical number of hospitalizations. Jonathan Vigliotti is...
